common.tagline: The Water of Life, Where Roots Begin Again

home.heroTitle: Microgreens and hydrosols that bring the Water of Life to your table.
home.heroSubtitle: We grow microgreens packed with nutrients using water-efficient, pesticide-free urban farming methods. Our zero-waste philosophy means surplus greens become aromatic hydrosols.
home.jineauDescription: Jineau combines "Jin" (ژین) — Kurdish for life — with "Eau" — French for water. Together, they form "Water of Life," a name that honors our roots and our mission.
home.whyJineauSubtitle: We combine ancient herbal wisdom with modern technology to grow the freshest, cleanest microgreens possible.
home.subscriptionDescription: Choose your weekly pack size, select your favorite microgreens, and we handle the rest. Cancel or modify anytime before the cutoff.
home.whoWeGrowForSubtitle: Fresh microgreens for every lifestyle and need.
home.testimonialsSubtitle: See what our subscribers in Montérégie have to say.
home.journalSubtitle: Tips, recipes, and stories from the farm.
home.ctaSubtitle: Start your weekly microgreens subscription today and taste the difference of truly fresh greens.
home.featuredProductsSubtitle: Hand-picked microgreens and hydrosols, harvested fresh for you.

shop.title: Shop Fresh Microgreens & Hydrosols
shop.subtitle: Harvested fresh, delivered Friday evening. All products use our high-tech clean technology and are ready to eat.
shop.subscriptionCta: Get fresh microgreens delivered every Friday evening with our weekly subscription plans.

subscribe.title: Weekly Microgreens Subscription
subscribe.subtitle: Fresh, clean microgreens delivered to your door every Friday evening. Choose your plan and customize your selection.
subscribe.harvestToDoorDesc: We harvest fresh and deliver Friday evening. Your greens are at peak freshness.
subscribe.freshSwapDesc: Unused packs from your weekly delivery? Request a free replacement.
subscribe.skipAnytimeDesc: Life happens. Modify, skip, or cancel your subscription before the cutoff.
subscribe.step3Desc: Your greens are picked at peak freshness
subscribe.orderCutoffNote: Order by Wednesday 11:59 PM for Friday delivery. Cancel anytime.
subscribe.buyOneGiftOneDesc: Would you like us to deliver a second fresh box to a senior center of your choice?
subscribe.letJineauChoose: Let Jineau choose a senior center in Montérégie
subscribe.specifyCenter: I want to specify a senior center myself

about.title: About Jineau
about.storyP1: Jineau was born from a simple observation: the freshest, most nutritious greens should be accessible to everyone, not just those with the time and space to grow their own.
about.storyP2: We started with a passion for urban farming and a deep respect for traditional Kurdish and Persian herbal wisdom. Our ancestors understood the power of fresh herbs and greens—we're simply bringing that wisdom into the modern age with technology that ensures purity without chemicals.
about.storyP3: Today, from our facility in Candiac, we grow microgreens in a controlled environment with triple-filtered air and water, using advanced clean technology to ensure every pack is clean and ready to eat. No washing required, no waste produced—just pure, living nutrition delivered to your door.

howItWorks.title: How Jineau Works
howItWorks.subtitle: From our farm to your table in 24 hours. Here's how we deliver the freshest microgreens in Montérégie.
howItWorks.step1Desc: Browse our selection of clean microgreens and hydrosols. Pick individual packs or start a weekly subscription for the best value.
howItWorks.step2Desc: Place your order by Wednesday 11:59 PM to be included in Friday's delivery. This gives us time to plan our harvest for peak freshness.
howItWorks.step3Desc: Your microgreens are harvested at peak maturity. They go through our high-tech cleaning process—no water waste, no chemicals, just clean greens.
howItWorks.step4Desc: Your order arrives Friday evening, within 24 hours of harvest. Store in your fridge and enjoy the freshest microgreens possible for 6-10 days.
howItWorks.storageSubtitle: Keep your microgreens fresh and delicious with these simple tips.
howItWorks.keepSealedDesc: Leave microgreens in their original clamshell container until ready to use.
howItWorks.topShelfDesc: Store on the top shelf of your refrigerator where it's coldest but won't freeze.
howItWorks.enjoyFreshDesc: Best consumed within 6-10 days. No washing needed—they're clean with our advanced technology!
howItWorks.freshSwapSubtitle: We stand behind our freshness promise.
howItWorks.freshSwapQuestion: Didn't use all your greens this week?
howItWorks.freshSwapAnswer: Life happens. If you have unopened packs from your subscription that you didn't get to use, simply let us know before your next delivery. We'll replace them for free—no questions asked.
howItWorks.freshSwapBenefit3: Unused packs donated to local food banks

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about our microgreens, delivery, and subscriptions.
faq.contactUs: We're here to help! Reach out to us and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.

forFamilies.title: Microgreens for Families & Kids
forFamilies.tagline: Easy nutrition the whole family will love
forFamilies.description: Make healthy eating fun with colorful microgreens in lunchboxes, snacks, and family meals. Our Marmot mascot makes greens exciting for kids!
forFamilies.whyFamiliesSubtitle: Safe, nutritious, and convenient—everything busy parents need.
forFamilies.readyToEatSafetyDesc: Our high-tech cleaning means no washing required. Open, serve, enjoy—safe and convenient for busy parents.
forFamilies.nutrientPowerhouseDesc: Microgreens pack up to 40x more vitamins and minerals than mature vegetables. A little goes a long way for growing kids.
forFamilies.lunchboxPerfectDesc: Small, mess-free, and delicious. Add to sandwiches, wraps, or enjoy as a crunchy snack.
forFamilies.pickyEaterApprovedDesc: Mild, tender greens that even veggie-skeptical kids enjoy. Start with sweet pea shoots or nutty sunflower.
forFamilies.lunchboxIdeasSubtitle: Creative ways to add microgreens to your child's meals.
forFamilies.marmotDesc: Kids love our friendly marmot who reminds them that eating greens is fun! Look for our marmot on special recipe cards and fun facts included with every family subscription.
forFamilies.familyPlanSubtitle: Our 5-pack subscription is perfect for families.

forChefs.title: Microgreens for Chefs & Restaurants
forChefs.description: Premium microgreens with extended shelf life, consistent supply, and hyper-local sourcing. Perfect for garnishes, flavor accents, and signature dishes.
forChefs.consistentQualityDesc: Every delivery meets the same high standards. No surprises, no quality variations—just perfect greens week after week.
forChefs.extendedShelfLifeDesc: 6-10 days of freshness means less waste and more flexibility in your menu planning.
forChefs.noPrepRequiredDesc: Clean with advanced technology and ready to plate. Save time and labor costs with our ready-to-use microgreens.
forChefs.hyperLocalDesc: Harvested Friday, delivered Friday evening. Tell your guests exactly where their greens came from.
forChefs.culinaryApplicationsSubtitle: Versatile microgreens for every style of cuisine.
forChefs.chefPlanSubtitle: Our 7-pack subscription delivers maximum value for busy kitchens.

forWellness.title: Hydrosols for Wellness Practitioners
forWellness.description: Our hydrosols are pure plant waters—gentle, aromatic, and versatile. Perfect for facial mists, room sprays, or holistic wellness rituals.
forWellness.whyPractitionersSubtitle: Pure, plant-based aromatics for holistic wellness.
forWellness.plantBasedDesc: Our hydrosols are pure plant waters with no synthetic additives, preservatives, or artificial fragrances.
forWellness.gentleVersatileDesc: Suitable for facial mists, room sprays, linen fresheners, and integration into holistic wellness routines.
forWellness.zeroWasteDesc: Distilled from surplus microgreens, our hydrosols represent our commitment to zero-waste production.
forWellness.artisanalQualityDesc: Small-batch production ensures consistent quality and aromatic integrity in every bottle.
forWellness.hydrosolUsesSubtitle: Versatile applications for wellness and self-care.
forWellness.externalUseOnly: For external use only. Our hydrosols are not intended for internal consumption.
forWellness.noMedicalClaims: No medical claims. While hydrosols have been used traditionally for various purposes, we make no claims about treating, curing, or preventing any medical conditions.
forWellness.patchTest: Patch test recommended. If you have sensitive skin or allergies, we recommend testing a small area before broader application.
forWellness.storeProperlyNote: Store properly. Keep in a cool, dark place to maintain aromatic quality. Best used within 6 months of opening.

blog.readyToTryDesc: Start your weekly subscription and taste the difference.

footer.tagline: Locally grown microgreens and hydrosols, delivered fresh to your door.
footer.deliveryAreasDesc: Montérégie: Longueuil, Brossard, St-Lambert, La Prairie, Candiac & more

features.filteredAirWaterDesc: Our controlled environment uses triple-filtered air and purified water for the cleanest possible growing conditions.
features.zeroChemicalsDesc: No pesticides, no synthetic fertilizers, no herbicides. Just pure, natural growing.
features.highTechCleanDesc: Advanced sanitization technology means your greens are clean and ready to eat—no washing required.
features.hydrosolsSurplusDesc: Nothing goes to waste. Surplus greens become functional, aromatic hydrosols.
features.justInTimeDesc: Harvested fresh, delivered Friday evening. Your greens are at peak freshness within 24 hours of harvest.
features.mapaqAlignedDesc: Our facility meets Quebec food safety standards for commercial food production.

sunflower-microgreens.name: Sunflower Microgreens
sunflower-microgreens.description: Our sunflower microgreens offer a delightful nutty flavor with a satisfying crunch. Rich in vitamins A, B, D, and E, plus essential fatty acids. Perfect for salads, sandwiches, and smoothies. Clean with our high-tech technology, ready to eat straight from the pack.
sunflower-microgreens.usage: Add to salads, sandwiches, wraps, or blend into smoothies. Great as a garnish for soups and rice bowls.
sunflower-microgreens.storage: Keep sealed in the refrigerator on the top shelf. Enjoy within 6-10 days for best freshness.
sunflower-microgreens.allergenNote: Grown in a facility that handles sunflower seeds.

pea-shoots.name: Pea Shoots
pea-shoots.description: Delicate pea shoots with a sweet, mild flavor that kids love. High in vitamin C and fiber. Their tender texture makes them perfect for salads and as a garnish. Clean with our high-tech technology, no washing required.
pea-shoots.usage: Perfect raw in salads or lightly sautéed. Add to stir-fries in the last minute of cooking.
pea-shoots.storage: Store in the original container on the top shelf of your refrigerator. Best within 6-8 days.
pea-shoots.allergenNote: Grown in a facility that handles pea seeds.

radish-microgreens.name: Radish Microgreens
radish-microgreens.description: Bold, peppery radish microgreens with beautiful red stems. Packed with vitamins A, B, C, E and K. Adds a colorful punch to any dish. Clean with our high-tech technology, ready to enjoy immediately.
radish-microgreens.usage: Top tacos, sandwiches, and sushi. Use as a garnish for soups and appetizers for a spicy kick.
radish-microgreens.storage: Keep refrigerated in the original container. Consume within 7-10 days.
radish-microgreens.allergenNote: Grown in a facility that handles radish seeds.

broccoli-microgreens.name: Broccoli Microgreens
broccoli-microgreens.description: Mild-flavored broccoli microgreens contain up to 40x more sulforaphane than mature broccoli. Excellent for those seeking maximum nutrition with minimal taste impact. Clean with our high-tech technology.
broccoli-microgreens.usage: Blend into smoothies, add to salads, or top avocado toast. Mix into dips for hidden nutrition.
broccoli-microgreens.storage: Refrigerate immediately. Best consumed within 5-7 days of delivery.
broccoli-microgreens.allergenNote: Grown in a facility that handles broccoli seeds.

mixed-microgreens.name: Mixed Microgreens
mixed-microgreens.description: A curated mix of our best microgreens, selected for complementary flavors and visual appeal. The blend changes seasonally to feature our freshest varieties. Perfect for those who want variety. Clean with our high-tech technology.
mixed-microgreens.usage: Use as a complete salad base or topping for any dish. The variety of flavors works with almost any cuisine.
mixed-microgreens.storage: Keep sealed and refrigerated. Consume within 6-8 days for optimal freshness.
mixed-microgreens.allergenNote: Grown in a facility that handles various seeds.

basil-microgreens.name: Basil Microgreens
basil-microgreens.shortDescription: Aromatic Italian basil in micro form.
basil-microgreens.description: Concentrated basil flavor in delicate microgreen form. Intensely aromatic with the classic Italian basil taste you love. Perfect for caprese salads, pasta, and Mediterranean dishes. Clean with our high-tech technology.
basil-microgreens.usage: Add to pasta, pizza, salads, and sandwiches. Use as garnish for soups and appetizers.
basil-microgreens.storage: Store refrigerated. Best used within 5-7 days while most aromatic.
basil-microgreens.allergenNote: Grown in a facility that handles basil seeds.

arugula-microgreens.name: Arugula Microgreens
arugula-microgreens.description: Bold, peppery arugula microgreens with a distinctive zesty flavor. Rich in vitamins K, A, and C. Perfect for adding a spicy kick to salads, pizzas, and sandwiches. Clean with our high-tech technology, ready to eat.
arugula-microgreens.usage: Add to salads, pizza, sandwiches, and pasta dishes. Great as a garnish for soups and appetizers.
arugula-microgreens.storage: Keep sealed in the refrigerator on the top shelf. Enjoy within 6-10 days for best freshness.
arugula-microgreens.allergenNote: Grown in a facility that handles arugula seeds.

pea-shoot-hydrosol.name: Pea Shoot Hydrosol
pea-shoot-hydrosol.description: Distilled from our surplus pea shoots, this hydrosol captures the fresh, green essence of spring. Use as a facial mist, room spray, or in wellness rituals. 100% plant-based with no synthetic additives.
pea-shoot-hydrosol.usage: Mist on face for a refreshing boost, use as a room spray, or add to linen for a clean scent.
pea-shoot-hydrosol.storage: Store in a cool, dark place. Best used within 6 months of opening.
pea-shoot-hydrosol.safetyNote: For external use only. Patch test before broad application.

sunflower-hydrosol.name: Sunflower Hydrosol
sunflower-hydrosol.description: Created from our sunflower microgreen surplus, this hydrosol has a subtle, warm aroma. Perfect for self-care routines and creating a cozy atmosphere. Zero waste, 100% natural.
sunflower-hydrosol.usage: Use as a gentle facial toner, body mist, or room freshener. Pairs well with meditation and yoga.
sunflower-hydrosol.storage: Keep away from direct sunlight. Refrigerate after opening for extended freshness.
sunflower-hydrosol.safetyNote: External use only. Not for consumption. Consult a practitioner if pregnant.

basil-hydrosol.name: Basil Hydrosol
basil-hydrosol.description: Our basil hydrosol captures the bright, herbaceous essence of fresh basil. An uplifting aromatic experience for body and space. Distilled in small batches from surplus microgreens.
basil-hydrosol.usage: Spritz as a facial mist, use in aromatherapy, or spray on linens for an herbal scent.
basil-hydrosol.storage: Store in a cool, dark place. Use within 6 months for best aromatic quality.
basil-hydrosol.safetyNote: For external use only. Keep out of eyes. Patch test recommended.
